title: For which lists would binary search be appropriate

content.question:
For which of the following lists can a binary search be used to search for an item in the list?
["blue", "green", "jade", "mauve", "pink"]
[5, 5, 5, 5, 6, 7, 8, 8, 8]
[10, 5, 3, 2, -4, -8, -9, -12]

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Investigate the situation, context, or task.
